data.footnotes: Ninaapa kwa nyota inapo tua kwa kuchwa, ya kwamba Muhammad hakuiacha Njia iliyo sawa ya kufuata Haki, na wala hakupata kuitakidi upotovu.

dua.name: Ayat al-Rahman
dua.significanceReason: Initiates the Surah of Mercy, profoundly emphasizing divine compassion, teaching, and the comprehensive nature of Allah's mercy.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
